ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB) = USSGL(4801 + 4831 + 4871 + 4881). This applies to the award level.
ObligationsDeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB) = USSGL(4901 + 4931 + 4971 + 4981). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB) = USSGL(4802 + 4832 + 4872+ 4882). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB) = USSGL(4902 + 4908 + 4972 + 4982). This applies to the award level.
ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (CPE) = USSGL(4801 + 4831 + 4871 + 4881). This applies to the award level.
ObligationsDeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (CPE) = USSGL(4901 + 4931 + 4971 + 4981). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (CPE) = USSGL(4802 + 4832 + 4872+ 4882). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (CPE) = USSGL(4902 + 4908 + 4972 + 4982). This applies to the award level.
Required on rows that do not include values for USSGL accounts balances or subtotals
True if at least one of the USSGL fields is populated
